name: Sonoran Squad
description:
Welcome to the early alpha for Sonoran Squad, a (soon to be) online fps focused around 6v6 objective play. In this very early build,, the only spot available is the hub world. This is the culmination of about 9 months of learning how to use UE5 and learning how to make games in general. Feedback and suggestions are absolutely appreciated.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

E: Interact

Left click: Shoot

Right click: ADS

\: Pause (Changing it to escape soon)
